content.detailedDescription:
I am a pilot for a charter company. 
flying at 36,000 ft my co-pilot and i were flying south down the coast of georgia around 9 pm. we are both very familiar with seeing satellites and meteors on every night flight. 
my co-pilot said "there's one", i looked about 45 degrees up at 1 o-clock, thinking i would never see it, because they are so tiny and slow, that they are hard to pick out of from the stars sometimes. 

i immediately saw this satellite for 2 reasons. 1 it was brighter, not to any great extent, but there were stars that were brighter, but was the brightest object in its immediate area. 2 its speed, it was tremendously fast. it moved from west to east at a very high rate. i don't want to try to estimate altitude or speed, but to say it was definitely extremely high and fast. it went from the right side of the cockpit to the left in less than 10 seconds. 

my first thought was meteor.
except that it was pulsing on and off like a rheostat light switch. the light would dim and un-dim quickly. no flashing on or off like a beacon or strobe. the whole thing would dim to nothing in about a half second then un-dim in about a half a second. i felt immediately that it was man-made or at least not a natural object. the pulsing was very regular in timing, and its speed was very constant since the distance traveled in between pulses was the same. 
we lost sight of it about 11 o-clock high as it pulsed off and did not pulse on again. we joked that we had seen a unidentified falling object, if it was a meteor. but we both came to the same conclusion that neither of us had ever seen anything like that before.
content.summary: Looked like a bright satellite.

content.detailedDescription: Standing on the back porch looking at the stars, i noticed a large triangular object with a border of lights that seemed to flash, although it may have been due to the distance.The center was not lit up and couldn't tell if it was solid or open. it was so much larger and brighter than anything else in the sky that i noticed it as soon as i began viewing the night sky. i wondered if it was something projected from the ground, but it was much too high in the sky for that. nor could it be a light projection from the earth to sky. it was located in the upper southwest quadrent. it remained stationary for over 15 minutes. i returned to the house, but came out an hour later. it was still there. this time i noticed an aircraft flying below it and could compare sizes somewhat. the triangular object was much larger, perhaps 50 times larger. i watached for another 15 minutes. the object remained stationary. an hour later i returned to look but it was gone. i hoped the triangular object was being viewed by the aircraft and that i might read about it in the newspaper, but it was not.  i felt confounded by the object, trying to make sense of it, but could find no explanation for what it might be and concluded that it was a ufo.
content.summary: Spotted large triangular object in sky. it was bordered with lights that seemed to flash.

content.detailedDescription:
I had my eyes on the skies in london tonight and i noticed a couple of strange objects. the first one you see i thought was a star but it was the only one visible in the night sky which i thought was unusual. the second is an object floating across the city which then seems to fade away. because tonight was a no-fly in london because of the volcanic ash from iceland my first though was this should/could not be a plane or helicopter. it did seem to move at a very steady rate and faded out very quick.

to help give you some idea where the object was above i live in canada water/rotherhithe just and i was looking north/north east. i guess the object would have been moving east to west. the first object i seen would have been in the west/north west.

here is a video of the event:
http://vimeo.Com/10992716
content.summary: Sphere object seen flying over london

content.detailedDescription: I was on the front porch me and my cousin i turned my head i saw a bright light flashing i ask my cousin do he see it he said it was a airplane i said just keep looking at it he said its changing colors i then said you see what i see i didn't want him to think i was crazy i got up walked away from and called 911 and asked if they could seen someone out  i then told my cousin i called 911 so we kept watching the object it started going up and down the officers arrived we showed them the object it was three officers they took out there binoculars and they were like we see a object with different lights flashing they then got in touch with the local air field there radar had shown that nothing was out there then one of officers spotted another object  then another spotted three objects like near each other there were several in the sky i did not count them witnesses were my mother my aunt my brother and grandmother
content.summary: Ufo

content.detailedDescription:
I went to the window & few min. later in the southern part of sky & very low over the lake , a flash caught my eye & i've looked in that area & there it showed up again & at extreme speed it went in a back & forth motion , like side to side (se to sw) . this repeated it self 5 times . wasn't rhythmic , more like 2 times i had to wait & see if it would re-appear again . after the last quick glide towards the west , it just stopped & while still looking in that direction , all of a sudden i in a nick of time saw on the left side of my eye a lot less weaker  flush of light ball & than all was over . i've waited few minutes , but it has not reappeared . before writting this report here i have checked the maps of where exactly it must have been , & judging by the distance it must have been on the american side , somewhere over the pensilvania -ohio corridor . i'm sure someone there must have seen it as it was huge ! the size of the ball/flush light seemed to be as big as a moon . the aureola of the light or edge rim was very wide & a bit fuzzy . as for the distance it must have 'travelled' like this for many miles . this whole sighting lasted about 3-4 min, i estimate .
 have no idea of what it could have been . while looking at this i felt some pressure at the temples but i think it was due to my trying to keep up with it as to not losing it from my view , plus it was in the middle of the night . time it happened was at approx. 12:35 am - 12:38 am.
no photos available .
content.summary: Strange very large white flash light going back & forth , as if looking for something , in a low horizon perhaps 25* angle to the horizon & over the lake but it looked much much further as if over the lake erie on the us side (direct south).

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 9 p.M. pdt on april 15th, 2010 in ventura california.
i was looking toward the west at the constellation of orion when i heard a brief ���screech��� sound lasting around one second and coming from the vicinity which i was viewing. thinking it was an owl i quickly looked for it and saw a faint silhouette of something moving in the clear sky.  at first it looked like it was a large bird high in the air as the front and two sides were heavily darkened against the mostly dark sky.  it was moving toward me and over a period of about 2 seconds it became clearer and resembled a hang-glider. it was descending and moving toward the east and seemed to be gliding smoothly, making no sound that i could hear.   as it reached its closest point to me, what looked to be several hundred feet or so, a very sharp and definite outline appeared.  it was an equilateral triangle and had three circular areas symmetrically placed near the tips. there was a slight contrast between the gray triangular area and the circular areas, as the circular portions had a very faint glowing quality to them.  as it silently continued moving away from me, the craft seemed to have only 2 dimensions.  it looked completely flat like it was a projection.  it began to gently ripple with smooth wave patterns and disappeared within a little over a second after doing so. the total event lasted around 8 seconds.
i have my master���s degree in physics and teach college level physics as a career.  i am also involved in astronomy.  i am about 20 minutes drive from a naval base and do hear and see military aircraft from time to time. though it is possible that i was seeing a ���secret aircraft���, i am doubtful that such a craft would be flown in such plain view as it was very apparent what was seen.  judging from the change in angular diameter, its descent was fairly rapid and it changed from a dark, fluctuating shadow into a crisp configuration, lightly contrasted against the clear dark sky.  i would estimate the base of the triangle to be around 50 feet, though i could be way off.   once leveled off at around 500 feet, it glided forward at perhaps 100 miles per hour until it disappeared from sight somewhat like a mirage does. the measured angle from the horizontal at which the craft began to wave out of sight was around 20 degrees.  it all happened very fast and was short in duration, making it difficult to be definite on measurements.  all in all, i saw a craft without doubt and i am perplexed by what i have seen.
content.summary: Triangular craft seen

content.detailedDescription: While looking up at the stars tonight, my wife and i witnessed two star looking objects moving accross the sky. they were about an inch apart at arms distant. the looked similar to satelites moving accros the sky. they were moving from south, south west towards the north east. when the two objects got under the big dipper, they slowly dissapeared.
content.summary: Two stars following each other.

content.detailedDescription: my son whose name in joshua,was playing in the front yard of our home when he says he saw a ufo. he told me that to the west of my home he saw a brightly lit object fly close to our home and stop to the south. he said it was like a upside down triangle. when it stopped,red and orange lights twinkled, like christmas lights and the center of the shape was see thru.He then said the ufo that was silent flew south faster than anything he had ever seen.My son is a 3.75 gpa student and i know he is telling the truth.
content.summary: Son frightened by ufo in front yard.

content.detailedDescription: On the night of april 15,2010 at 8:27pm i was riding along in a vehicle on  a highway passing a grocery store called shnuck's.The sky was black with no stars in sight when suddenly three white spherical orbs rushed down hovering from no where about 214 feet off the ground.When i first saw this i thought where those lights came from them the orbs came lower about 25 feet. after about 10 minutes of watching this there was suddenly a 3 second power outage, but when all of the lights from the store came back on beside me one of the orbs started to smoke like a plane does when it has been shot then i noticed that in these luminous orbs where humanoids and i stared to panick. one of the humanoids pointed towards ssw direction and then all three orbs began to gai nquite some altitude then vanished. once the humanoids vanished i started to think what just happened and if i should tell my friends, but my thoughts were suddenly interupted by the noise of a helicopter and supposable an f-16 military fighter jet that zoomed right over me.Thankfully i got a picture but after the picture was saved into my phone the screen twitched and the picture was immediatly erased.
content.summary: The event that happened this night occured with 3 spheres also three humanoids practically riding the spheres.

content.detailedDescription:
Okay, let me start by saying i know for a fact that this is not a star, this is not a plane, this is not a meteor or space junk or satellite or anything else like that. 
i have been seeing this craft for about 5-6 years now, here in wisconsin. it appears as a bright, white ball of light, and sometimes, a lot of times, it will fade out gradually and disappear completely, and then re-appear, sometimes getting larger in size. it basically sits in one spot, just "hanging" there in the air, moving slowly up and down, left and right, around and around, sometimes fast. it always seems pretty close. a lot closer than stars or airplanes. 
sometimes, right when you look at it, it will disappear, as if it knows your watching it and/or is playing around.
it does not have any other lights on it, it is just one big ball of light. it hovers above the woods sometimes and sometimes in the fields, or the horizon. i live in the country, outside of platteville. i will see it very low on the horizon sometimes when the sun is going down. i have seen it during the middle of the day a couple times.
my mother and little sister are the only other persons that i know of that have seen it. i'm sure other people around platteville have seen it, because of how often i see it, but i'm not sure.
she(they) has only just seen it recently though(mom,sis), january 30th, of 2010. we were on our way to shullsburg, wisconsin, taking my younger sister to a friends house. it was around 4pm, so it was still light out. i'm not sure which direction we were driving, but as always i was just kind of eyeing the skies and spotted it and pointed it out to her. i have told her about it before, and she has never doubted me but is the type to have to see something to believe it, and she couldn't explain it herself.  

we pretty much observed the object the whole time on the way to shullsburg, with it sometimes disappearing for a while. on our way back to platteville we only noticed it peeping out a few times until we got close, then it appeared, it was near our airport, and i noticed a plane or jet flying up towards it, climbing higher and starting to go faster and closer to it. me and my mom were both observing this as we were coming into platteville. when the jet/plane got right to it, the craft disappeared completely. the jet/plane then slowed down and descended, right then the craft re-appeared in the same spot. 
we were both pretty stunned by this, and i was very excited because i've always heard of this type of sighting, when a jet or plane chases a ufo but have never seen it until now. 
the ufo i see though, i have not really heard any similar type of ufo craft. not as bright and close, and fading away and re-appearing. i see it very often. what made me first notice the craft, 5-6 years ago, would just have been me watching the skies, as i have always had an affinity for ufo's. when i see the craft i don't feel frightened or any negative effects, they aren't here to do any harm, i do not believe. 
the photo's i have included are of the craft. 
this is what happened when i photographed it. 
i cannot explain it, it's not like this before or after i take the photo or when i'm looking through the lens, it's strange and i don't understand it not 1 bit. 
the camera i have and used to take the pictures with is a nikon l4. nikkor 3x optical zoom, 6.3-18.9mm , 1 : 2.8-4.9
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Witness an orb/ball bright white ufo that fades and re-appears.

content.detailedDescription:
I went out to the garden to have a smoke. i lit my ciggarette then looked at the stars to stargaze abit. i saw a red light moving and thought it was a plane since the airport is nearby. but then the light didn't blink like the lights on planes. and then i started seeing it glow and five lines potruding out of the center. i thought i got dirt in my eyes but i looked at other lights and didn't see the lines. so i kept watching it and it started to move erratically although very slowly. i watched it for around 3-4 minutes before it started pulseating and then dissapearing all together. i was still in shock as i looked around. 

as i looked behind me i saw a whitish light with the same star like features. it was remarkably still but would twinkle in colors of blue, red, yellow, green, and violet. it stayed there for half an hour roughly and i took my camera and took a few pictures of it. what i got were time lapse pictures showing not blinking but again pulsing lights, this time in different colors. after i went in to tell people inside, the light was gone. now i oly have the pictures to prove my story. i am writing this on my phone so if i could have an email address to send my pictures to i will send them at once.
content.summary: 2 star like lights. bigger than stars. have halo and lines projecting from it. colors red and rainbow

content.detailedDescription:
This has been going on for about 2 weeks, every night except for one. it appears to be small and cylindric. usually it's yellow but sometimes i'll see a flash of red. it can move fast but usually it's still unless i move then it moves to follow i guess.If i wave at it or throw up the peace sign it moves in it's general area and flashes. last night 4/15/09 there was also a smaller cylindric object that moved and hovered right above the phone lines in my vacinity. it flashed red and one or two other colors. it also seemed to make a hardly audible noise that kind of sounded like morris code coming in. i'm not saying it was morris code, that's just what it sounded like. i've also seen a few triangles, i think.
but i am positive about the rest. interesting note, he first time i saw it about an hour after it appeared there was two military aircraft first making circular patterns ever closer to it then they crossed each others path in a grid like fashion getting closer to it each time. when they got close enough they would turn of their lights. there was also 1 stealth type plane that came into play 40 minutes after the other 2 aircrafts had already been there observing it. a neighbor saw all of this too. i just want someone to believe me and send a team here. you won't be dissapointed.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.shape: Circle,   Fireball,   Flash,   Sphere,   Star-like,   Triangle
content.summary: U.F.O's over field by neighborhood

content.detailedDescription:
What i witness the night of tuesday 13, 2010 about 9:00 pm:

i spot and observed an object like ���������v��������� shape flying above my head. i was doing some cleaning in my place and i went out to throw some garbage in trash container in the alley when i look up to the sky i saw this big dark gray flying object. was almost a perfect ���������v��������� shape with couple circular light under each wing! 

the material/skin or color of the object was kind of translucent not transparent like camouflaging with the dark background of the sky and the color was a dark dimness gray, the lights were a circular shape white/gray very, soft, faint color, not flashy and the intensity was very dim and consistent.

the flying object was moving from east to west going towards the ocean almost parallel to the santa monica bld. and was flying at mid altitude at slow and consistent speed just cruising, no noises, no vibrations, and no changes in the brightness of its lights or the shape of the object. i observed it for i would say a minute and half or two the most, then slowly vanish, and disappear in the darkness of the night.

i don���������t know how to explain how and what i feel with this experience, besides to be thrill and somewhat perplex for what i witness, i just know that was very real and i don���������t know if anyone have seeing something similar but i would be more that happy to take a polygram test to validate my story. this is probably the most profound experience of my life, very real, very fascinating, a lifetime occurrence for sure.
content.summary: I spot and observed an object like ï¿½vï¿½ shape flying above my head

content.detailedDescription:
For three consecutive nights (march 27,28, and 29th), at approximately the same time each night (10:25ish), my husband and i saw a large bright white light hovering about 150 feet from the ground water level over johnson's bay to the west of our house.  on the first night, it was raining when this happened.  on the second night it was cloudy, no stars, no moon...And on the third night, there was a full moon off to the east.  

we ruled out that it was an airplane or helicopter because it was too low, hovered far to long, and was totally silent.  on the first night, we watched it for about half an hour and it disappeard in a poof!  on the second night, we watched it for an hour, and then went to bed before it disappeared.  on the third night, we did the same.  

on the morning of march 29th, fire chief emilio rodriguez called us about 8:30 a.M. to see if we had been on-line to look at the weather cam.  he was excited and said, "the camera caught on film last night this large white light shaped in somewhat of a flattened ball that dropped straight down from the sky and then hovered in the same spot without moving until finally after hours, it just seemed to drop to the ground and disappear."

we were both curious and skeptical at first, but also at the same time had an erier feeling that this was something very out of the normal. we have no major air bases near us, no military and no industry that would be experimenting with something like this.
content.summary: Bright white large round light slightly compressed completely stationary, silent and approx. 150 from water level.

content.detailedDescription:
I was working that night. i have a delivery job that takes me from athens georgia all over the east and southeast portion of the stae.
 i was a few miles outside of wrens georgia when i noticed 2 bright lights off to my right moving in the same direction as i was driving. at first i thought it was just a low flying military cargo plane, because i see those from time to time. . the lights faded out. that got my attention. and it was then i realized i hadnt heard the plane like i normally do. 
a few miles down the road, i saw the lights again. this time stationary over a really large field. i pulled over and got out of my van to watch them. they seemed orangish at times, and at other times they seemed white.
whatever it was , it was completly silent. no sound at all. and i had cut off the van so i could hear it if it had made noises.
i called my mother on my cell phone because she was the only one i knew that would be up that late during the week. right as she answered, two more lights appeared. one to the left of the original two, and one to the right. none of them moved. i know that area really well, i travel that road twice a night, coming and going. there is nothing there to make those lights. after watching for a few minutes, they just faded out. 
so i got back in the van and continued on my route while on the phone.
  as i got closer and closer to wrens, the lights would sometimes reappear, sometimes only one. sometimes two. right outside of town, i saw one of the lights directly over the town of wrens. it faded , then reappeared. then faded again. i lost track of it while in town, the city lights made it impossible to see the sky properly.
as i got to the other side of town, i begin looking for the object/ or objects again. right outside of town, as i was looking up, way up high in the sky i saw between 10-12 lights appear together in a cluster, not like in the field where they were seperated by a lot of space. they appeared , flashed and were gone. this was at a really high altitude, not like over the field. 
it was a really dark night, and i never saw an outline of anything. just the lights. but i do know this wasnt an airplane or helicopter. no sound. it cetainly wasnt a planet. ive been driving at night for 9 years. i know what stars and planets look like in the night sky. this was not those.
it certainly wasnt a radio tower or anything like that either. since that night ive stopped in the area where i puleed over , and there isnt anything that causes lights in or near that field. 
i honestly have tried to come up with a rational explaination for it, but i cant.
content.summary: Lights in the sky. hovered over a field. and over the city of wrens

content.detailedDescription:
1.  investigating a case for mufon by taking photographs & readings of an old farm site, we captured on film a triangular shaped craft that appeared to be a light in the sky (a) & a bit later while on location in a state park several miles away, we witnessed a arc-like/crescent shaped pinkish-red light/craft (b) in the sky.

2a.  checking the digital pictures & saw orbs in the picture, but then i said what the hell is that dot of light in the upper corner.
2b.  checking the horizon.

3a.  a light in the sky not seen with the naked eye.
3b.  looked like the bottom crescent of the moon, but in the wrong direction.

4a.  n/a.
4b.  it was moving slowly towards us & moving up @ a 45 degree angle then it dematerialized before our eyes.

5a.  we were like wow that is strange.  it wasn't till we arrived home that the ssd downloaded the pics & saw it was triangular.
5b.  we were awe-struck because we never saw anything like this.

6a.  we never saw it until viewing the pics on the digital camera.
6b.  it dematerialized slowly & faded away.
content.summary: While out on a follow up investigation of an assigned case ci, ssd, & case witness witnessed several unexplained events.

content.detailedDescription: I am a realtor and was taking a rear view of a vacant home that i was selling in palm bay, fl on feb 21,2010. it was around 11:30am when the photo was taken. when i arrived home and was renaming the picture for my files, i noticed a strange object above the roof of the home.  i tried to zoom in and was not able to make out what the object was.  it has an orange color to it.  my son said it was probably a butterfly but in relationship to the size of the home that didn't seem to make sense.  it may be nothing but i thought it would be wise to have some expert eyes check it out.
content.summary: Noticed after taking picture of a home i was selling

content.detailedDescription:
Iwas standing outside in a well lit parking area thats lights washed out all but the brighter stars and planets.I work outside at night providing security and am able to observe the night sky.I am good at spoting satelites in the early morn9ing hours most nights.I also get to see some great shooting stars,airliners,small planes and helocopters  and even sometimes large dark bats and lighter and higher,birds heading north west to i assume the marshes or ocean.
i am able to tell the difference between these objects and except for the bats and birds i usually can tell right away what i'm seeing,be it a satelite or high up airliner.
on the night of 4-08-2010 i was watching the sky where i had ealier seen a very good shooting star(southeast at about 30 degrees off the horizon).I noticed movement directly above me moving northwest very fast,as i looked up i saw a flash of movement go from about my 11 o'clock to about 3 o'clock or about 120 degrees.The object appeared to be lower than small airplanes,or about 1000 ft up.The object was very fast,made no sound,had orange dull lights at it's front and back and the section between the lights appeared as a shadow against the nights sky,but could be made out ,much as a black bat that flies above in the darkness can be seen black on black,but moving.
the object must have been at least 100 ft long and possibly larger if it was more than my guess of 1/4 mile above me.
it flew from above my left shoulder when firmly spotted to my left horizon which was a five story building at my 3 o'clock,heading northwest towards santa cruz area as the crow flies.
i was very startled and right away became highly scared.I checked my cell phone to bring some reality to what had just happened and it showed 3:14 a.M.
moments later i spoke to supervisor during a routine check and he was supportive but a little unsure about my need to tell such a unbelievable tale to someone.If somthing like my experience happens unexpectedly i think it is normal to want to tell someone who walks by.In hindsight it probably is better thought about beofre telling just anyone,but ,oh well!
i stayed at my post and now was hyper alert and keenly watching the sky .At about 3:50 a.M i observed a white light "turn on" in the due sout section of sky from me.The light was again a 1/4 -1/2 mile high or about 30 degrees.The object was about two miles due south of me and aproxamitly over the town of sprekles california.I was so startled to see a second object that i became almost in shock and did not check my cell phone for the exact time.The object appeared just as bright white star does,it did not blink or pulse,made no sound that i could hear and took straight off in the direction of the first sighting(northwest).The object moved in a straight path with no increase or change in speed.The speed appeared steady and much,much faster than the small planes that fly at that hiegth some nights, but not a streak like a shooting star.
at 4:06 a.M ,very alert now,i observed a third object "turn on in almost the same area of sky as the second object(bright white light)it may have been another mile south at most,copied the first light in every aspect,and wisked away heading northwest,also amking no apparent noise.
i am reporting this in hopes of bringing some details into record of a very unusual sighting i observed in the monterey bay area.
thank you for taking the time to read this.
content.summary: Long straight object  dull orange lights front and rear....Followed ...By two white orbs twenty ,and 35 minutes later....

content.detailedDescription:
sitting at computer ready to shut it down and go to bed when i heard a wierd rumbling sound outdoors.
 ran out and directly above house at an estimated 1000 or so feet up, alot lower than any other planes, was a huge diamond shaped craft. it had a bright white light at all four tips of its diamond shape, but also the craft itself could also be seen as a solid goldish green diamond.
 it traveled at a steady speed, est 15-20mph, and was traveling ne 60. on approach it made a very quiet low rumbling sound and as it flew above and then the further it got, the more high pitched and strange sounding it became.
 as it was directly above the house i had a few short seconds to run back indoors yelling for my girlfriend to come out quick quick quick, as i have seen this same thing about three years ago flying almost the exact same direction but lower, and was believed by her at the time, but with skepticism. this time as i awoke her from a deep sleep she did get to see it, as it was traveling so slow. so now i at least have a witness to it, yet it all happened in a minute or less and i must've wasted 20 seconds of that when i first was looking at it in amazement, for this time i could clearly make out and see the exact shape of it, but had no time for a camera. it was not "bat" or wing shaped like a b2 spirit bomber, this was a oblong diamond shape. a little bit more enlongated in the front and rear than the sides. the white lights were not blinking on each of the tips, and were very bright and large. there may have been a fifth light but i cannot remember the color of it, none were blinking.
 as it traveled further away, the solid shape of the body of it started to disappear. when it was directly overhead it appeared a pale green and then a translucent goldish color. as it disappeared on the treeline about 500 yards away, all that was visible were the corner lights.
 when it was directly above and flying overhead it did make a sound. it was a high pitched hissing whining sound, like a turbocharger without the engine. the further it got the more high pitched it became. it was low enouugh that if it were a jet or conventional plane of some sort, this late at night hte whole neighborhood would have awoken. just happened to be directly above my house, yet again. but this time i saw the shape. it was amazing.
 after my girlfriend calmed down from being angry for waking her up, she then thought it was pretty cool to see too, and says "you should have gotten the camera". now she believes i was telling the truth 3 years ago as well.
content.summary: Diamond shape ufo 4 lights on tips solid green gold diamond low slow

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my room looking out my window when i had noticed this object had been in the same spot for at least ten minutes of me first noticing it.  i remember thinking it was an approaching airplane at first, but when i looked back again in a few minutes, it was in the same spot.  i went to get my binoculars (10x42) and went outside to look.  when i looked through them , i could see the outer edge of this circular/disc shaped object was glowing green while the inner part was more of a reddish/golden color.  i watched the object for about 10-15 seconds.  after it not moving, i went to get my mother from inside to look.  when we came out, the object was still in the same spot hovering in the sky. i could see airplanes flying under and around the sky of the object.  it never moved and a few times it seemed to blink its light.  the whole object would disappear in an instant and reappear again just as fast.  i couldn't even see it in the binoculars.  there were no clouds in front of it but behind it, that's how i could tell it was inside the atmosphere.  it was a huge circular/disc shaped object.  even in the binoculars, at that distance, it was much bigger than an airplane.  it was silent, didn't move, and glowed... i had never seen anything like it before.  after about 20 mins of me seeing it, it just disappeared.
content.summary: This object behaved like nothing i've seen before.

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and several friends are camping at table rock, about 3 miles east of silver lake. sitting in their camp chairs, they look to the east a few miles, and just above the horizon they start seeing orangish-yellow, round discs in the sky. this begins about 8:30 and continues for a solid hour; it dwindles off but continues for the next half hour at least. (this is play by play as they call me with updates) at any given time 1 to 4 of these show up, dim, then another lights up, dims, sometimes at the same time, sometimes not. kind of like fireflies.

there is no moon but the weather is crisp, cold and clear. they're all a little freaked out, but excited too. mainly no one wants to get abducted or probed! my husband and a couple others witnessed this the same time of year a couple years ago and no one believed them. those same non-believers are currently watching this phenomenon! they were trying to film it but i don't know yet if they got anything. if it turns out they did - or do, since they'll be there a couple more days - we will try to post what turns up.
content.summary: About 30 - 40 sightings within 1-1/2 hours.

content.detailedDescription:
Hey,it doesn't fly fast and it makes no noise.The thing is it very different from anything i have ever seen.It floats through the sky and disappear.But right before it disappears it gets really bright,i have seen it twice.
thanks [cms/tg/pid]
content.summary: Bright orb

content.detailedDescription: Bright light flashing in the sky and moving fast and finally vanishes...Oval shaped object...My friends who don't belive in ufo's have also gone without explaintion.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright light flashing in the sky and moving fast and finally vanishes...

content.detailedDescription: At about 8:45 pm eastern time i was star gazing with our family when an orange glow appeared in the sky. we were looking at a shooting star then the ball appeared. the orange glow was about 5 times the size of the stars the orange glow was going about 30 degrees above the horizon, from north to south in the eastern sky. then two military style planes appeared behind it and it flew into the tree line out of sight. about 10-15 minutes later another ball appear going the opposite dirrection ( west to east and desending) then disappeared in the clouds. at first we thought that it was volcano related then 26 planes headed towards charlotte's airport withing a five minute period,  from all directions, two almost colliding from our veiwpoint. and this went on for about 20 minutes then normal flight patterns resumed. between the weird orange ball and the unusual flight patterns something strange is occuring.
content.summary: Bright orange spherical glow in the eastern night sky

content.detailedDescription: Hanging above the horizon at least 5 miles away between the city of garfield toward the city of rogers. seemed to rotate or pulsate red, blue or green very rapidly. at least a couple thousand feet over the horizon exactly to my southwest. watched the object stay stationary for 2 hours becore the earths rotation put it behind the horizon in my valley. not and lane, not a blimp, never gained altitude, just sat there and emitted bright light. it was not celestial. it did not flicker like an out of atomosphere object. it was not in the line of the planets from nw to se.
content.summary: Bright red/blue, and green ligths rotating in the darkness

content.detailedDescription:
Me and my friends were standing outside at a small bbq in my friends backyard. we were smoking cigarettes and just standing around enjoying the nice day. i was already looking at the sky when i saw whatever it is that i saw. its weird how it flew though, because when something is flying for example an airplane you can follow it across the sky and see how its following the circular motion around the earth through the sky. but, this thing was almost like it just cut through the atmosphere. just through a little chunk.  i have never seen anything that size it must have been gigantic! if i were to hold a 50 cent american coin at half arms length up to the sky it was about that big. i cant really explain how fast it went it was really weird because it got really quiet right before i saw it than it was almost like it just showed up and sat there for a second than it just zoomed off. but there were no tracers or cuts in the sky that i noticed. it was like a off shaped 3d triangle and the color of it was a mango-yellow   with a very light hint of light blue at the front tip.. i'm not the only one that saw it three other of my friends saw it too. my girl friend saw it as the same color. and the two guys i was with saw it as a greenish blue colors. i didn't really know what to think because i want the only one that saw it i thought it was very cool to see something so unusual.



(with the video its the image 3m 26s in. it kindof looked like that but had horizontal yellow lines in it)

link http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=6jel4fr4hre
content.summary: It was a huge, bright object that moved unlike anything that i have ever seen, even in space movies...

content.detailedDescription: My grandaughter and i were at the park and all of a sudden i looked up because the clouds caught my attention .As they crossed past the sun i decided to take some pictures of the clouds but what came out on my pictures were three ufo's one egg shape one sphere with the ball shape in the middle and another that looked like it was side ways with the ball shape facing right .I have the pictures but still can not believe what i have captured .I am still in shock but feel blessed to have these pictures.
content.summary: Three ufos hiding in the light !!!!

content.detailedDescription:
For you highly intellegent and enthusiastic mufon investigators... i have included camera photo's (which does not fabricate) for all to see... that this is not a mufon: gas bubble, or airplane, or anything else you might want to contrive as a reason to disregard it. for all you experts in the ufo field who feel that i am "too seriously involved" in my field study and investigation... too know fact from fiction, then sink your ignorant teeth into something you will probably never see! a real ufo! mufon, amongst other superior authoratative ufo experts, seem to think that they have all "smokin gun rights" to the reality to "something" that even they haven't seen, or can't explain. go ahead! keep sending your information to them, and they will own it! permanently!

[[cms/tg/pid]
content.summary: More nashville ufo sightings

content.detailedDescription:
I went outside with my pet last night about 9:15. looking up at the sky, i noticed the usual green/red/white "stars" were in the skies to the southeast, north, south, and southwest as they have been for about 5 years or so now. they don't move with the constellations as they should but they do appear in different locations some nights, again not moving with the constellations. sometimes, there are only 2 or 3 but most nights there are 4. they tend to take up residence near tv towers, cellphone towers, or the mica peak weather observation post. the nws tries to explain them away as venus or mars but they're really full of it! anyway, i came back in and went to close the curtains in my front room when i noticed a bright white light just above the cellphone towers in north spokane valley. it didn't move and was extremely bright white (like a roman candle but no tail and it didn't drop), and then i saw what looked like a helicopter with red lights approach from the south and get close to the light, and abruptly flew away. about the same time that the helicopter left, the green/red/white "star" to the southwest looked as if it got a lot closer and became very bright. once the helicopter lights disappeared completely, the "star" reverted to its original position. the bright light then dropped closer to the cellphone tower's height. approximately 10 min later, the bright white light disappeared behind the cellphone tower hill altogether. 

i still don't know what the heck is going on with these "stars" but it's becoming more frequent of late. not to mention the two unexplained "brush fires" since last summer (2009) on the southeastern hills near mica peak that no one seems to notice or give news time to.

and i don't think they are coming because they are already here.
content.summary: Bright light over north spokane valley

content.detailedDescription:
a mothers story. my mother told me something, and let me say this;if my mother ever told me something i always knew that i could beleive her. my mother was talking about the weather or whatever and i had gotten distracted by something. when i turned back around to face her and rejoin the conversation, i found that she had gotten on to the stangest subject. 'what did you say?'i asked her. it seemed that i had heard something that didnt make sense. so she told me a story of her at the door of her house and experiencing an hair raising event.'all she could do' she said.'was to try and run and grab the baby.'the thing' she said.' came down low and moved across the yard with a wistling noise'.
'really?'i said'what did it look like?''a flying saucer' she said 
'what did you do when you saw it?'i asked.'i thoght about the baby who was in the yard playing'she said.'it could hurt the baby''so you ran to grab the baby?'i asked.'yes' she said.' as soon as the stun came off me'whether the flying saucers sudden appearence or some capability of the thing to stun or freeze people in their steps caused her to be frozen in place, i dont know. my mother related this story to me one time in my life. at the time she was advanced in years and suffering from alzymers.
i beleive she had forgotten about the incedent for many years of her life, only to have it come to her mind as an elderly person, by chance i guess. im just lucky to have been their at the moment she remembered the incedent and chose to relate it to somebody.
content.summary: This is an account of my mothers about an unwelcome visitor in her yard
